description: Medicare is statutorily required to adjust payments for physician fee schedule services to account for differences in costs due to geographic location. There are currently 89 different localities which have not been revised since 1997. In the CY 2009 Physician Fee Schedule notice of proposed rulemaking, we indicated that we would post on the CMS website a preliminary study of several options for revising the payment localities.
title: Interim Study of Alternative Payment Localities under the...
